titles.title: Commemorating the second anniversary of the signing of the Abraham Accords Declaration.
Commemorating the second anniversary of the signing of the Abraham Accords Declaration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East, North Africa and Global Counterterrorism.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Middle East, North Africa, and Central Asia

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the second anniversary of the signing of the Abraham Accords, which created formal diplomatic ties between Israel and the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Sudan, and Morocco.
